articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: One of Google’s recent Gemini AI models scores worse on safety - TechCrunch
articles.description: A recently released Google AI model scores worse on certain safety tests than its predecessor, according to the company's internal benchmarking.
articles.content:
A recently released Google AI model scores worse on certain safety tests than its predecessor, according to the company’s internal benchmarking.
